pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:0.2_0: The account of the nun Analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:0.5_0: The training rule on criticizing one—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.10_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.12_0: consent to not being approved to give the full admission, and then criticize it afterwards?” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.13_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Caṇḍakāḷī did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.17_0: consent to not being approved to give the full admission, and then criticize it afterwards?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.18_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.19_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.20.1_0: ‘If a nun is told, “Venerable, you have given enough full admissions for now,” and she consents, saying, “Fine,” but then criticizes it afterwards, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.2_0: the nun Caṇḍakāḷī approached the Sangha of nuns and asked for approval to give the full admission.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.6_0: Soon afterwards the Sangha of nuns gave approval to other nuns to give the full admission.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.8_0: “So it seems I’m ignorant and shameless,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.9_0: The Sangha gives approval to other nuns, and we don’t give her the full admission.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.5_0: Venerable, you have given enough full admissions for now:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.6_0: Venerable, you have given enough full ordinations for now.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.7_0: If she consents, saying, ‘Fine,’ but then criticizes it afterwards, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.2_0: if she criticizes one who regularly acts from desire, ill will, confusion, or fear;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.5_0: The sixth rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
